General.Name: Mycron Steel Bhd
General.Description: Mycron Steel Berhad, an investment holding company, manufactures and sells mid-stream steel cold rolled coils and steel tubes in Malaysia. It offers cold rolled coil steel sheets, and steel pipes and tubes. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Shah Alam, Malaysia. Mycron Steel Berhad is a subsidiary of Melewar Industrial Group Berhad.
